alert.note: Alert for Tompkins (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 4:10PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Tompkins County through 445 PM EDT... At 410 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Newfield, or near Ithaca, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ithaca, Newfield, Cayuga Heights, Lansing, Enfield, Danby, Trumansburg, Taughannock Falls, Brooktondale and Slaterville Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
